transArray.content: I couldn't find my way around at night, so I called the front desk and they came to pick me up. The service was very good~~ Recommended. Breakfast is served until 11 o'clock, which is also very good

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy notes, I want you to write your mood in notes. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast has a variety of varieties, is nutritious and delicious, freshly cooked noodles, hot soup noodles and small pastries to satisfy your special delicacies without leaving home. The hotel's attentive service, a cup Hot tea will make you feel at home. The room you are staying in has a cleaning lady who is most worthy of your trust and provides attentive butler-like service. We look forward to your visit. General Manager: Li Changxia
